data.comment: Juventus kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Roma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Gianluca Rocchi awards Juventus a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Juventus!
Juventus push forward at Allianz Stadium and Federico Bernardeschi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Roma defence.
In the minute 5, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Rocchi.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Gonzalo Higuain.
Great play from Adrien Rabiot to set up the goal.
In the minute 7, Juventus to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Throw-in Juventus.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
In the minute 13, Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Roma's Nicolo Zaniolo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Juventus defender.
Roma's Davide Zappacosta gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 17, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gianluca Rocchi waits before resuming play because Adrien Rabiot for Juventus is still down.
Adrien Rabiot for Juventus is back on the field again.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juventus have a goal kick.
Gianluca Rocchi signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
In the minute 21, Juventus's Daniele Rugani has been booked in Turin.
Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Roma drive upfield and Riccardo Calafiori gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Juventus defender.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Roma.
Nikola Kalinic (Roma) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Allianz Stadium.
Diego Perotti with an assist there.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juventus have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Can Juventus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Roma's half?
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Roma.
In Turin Juventus attack through Gianluca Frabotta. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Gianluca Rocchi awards Juventus a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Roma in the half of Juventus.
Gianluca Rocchi signals a free kick to Juventus.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Rocchi.
In the minute 37, Juventus have a goal kick.
Free kick Juventus.
Gianluca Rocchi signals a throw-in for Juventus, close to Roma's area.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Chris Smalling is booked for the away team.
Juventus’s Gonzalo Higuain is on his feet again at Allianz Stadium.
Gianluca Rocchi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gonzalo Higuain for Juventus who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 43, Roma have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! Diego Perotti gives Roma a 1-2 lead from the penalty spot.
Roma drives forward and Nicolo Zaniolo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Throw-in Roma.
Can Juventus capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Federico Bernardeschi of Juventus gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Roma at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Diego Perotti for Roma has been booked by Gianluca Rocchi and receives a first yellow card.
Roma kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Gonzalo Higuain gets his shot on target but fails to score for Juventus.
In the minute 47, Gonzalo Higuain for the home team is judged to be offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Nikola Kalinic for Roma drives towards goal at Allianz Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Roma.
Gianluca Rocchi awards the home team a throw-in.
The home team replace Adrien Rabiot with Aaron Ramsey.
In the minute 51, Juventus make their second substitution with Merih Demiral replacing Leonardo Bonucci.
Diego Perotti puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-3.
Nicolo Zaniolo instrumental with a fine assist.
Federico Bernardeschi is back on his feet again.
In the minute 53, Play has been interrupted briefly in Turin to check on Federico Bernardeschi, who is grimacing with pain.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 54, Bryan Cristante (Roma) has received a yellow card from Gianluca Rocchi.
Important block from the Juventus defence as Nicolo Zaniolo fires in a strike for Roma.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Roma close to the penalty box.
Paulo Fonseca (Roma) is making a first substitution, with Juan Jesus replacing Roger Ibanez.
Cengiz Under is replacing Nicolo Zaniolo for Roma at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 56, Davide Santon is on a sub for Bryan Cristante for Roma.
Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Aaron Ramsey (Juventus) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Roma needs to be cautious. Juventus have an attacking throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Riccardo Calafiori.
In the minute 60, Riccardo Calafiori, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Bruno Peres is the substitute for Roma.
Gianluca Rocchi signals a Juventus throw-in in Roma's half.
Gianluca Rocchi signals a Juventus throw-in in Roma's half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Roma at Allianz Stadium.
Free kick Roma.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 68, Roma's Diego Perotti is on target but unsuccessful.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Rocchi.
Roma pushes forward through Cengiz Under, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 69, In Turin, Danilo of Juventus is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Juventus to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
In the minute 71, Luca Zanimacchia of Juventus is pulled up for offside.
Marco Olivieri is replacing Federico Bernardeschi for the home team.
Carlo Pinsoglio is on a sub for Wojciech Szczesny for Juventus.
In the minute 73, The away team have replaced Diego Perotti with Justin Kluivert. This is the fifth substitution made today by Paulo Fonseca.
Gianluca Rocchi awards Roma a goal kick.
Juventus's Simone Muratore misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Gianluca Rocchi signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
In the minute 77, Roma's Davide Zappacosta breaks free at Allianz Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Juventus have a goal kick.
Juventus's Gonzalo Higuain gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Maurizio Sarri is making the team's fifth substitution at Allianz Stadium with Giacomo Vrioni replacing Gonzalo Higuain.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Juventus in the half of Roma.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Rocchi.
In Turin, Merih Demiral (Juventus) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 82, Throw-in high up the field for Juventus in Turin.
Goal kick for Roma at Allianz Stadium.
Juventus have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 83, Gianluca Rocchi signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Roma are coming forward and Nikola Kalinic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
In the minute 85, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Rocchi.
Juventus are pushing forward but Aaron Ramsey's finish is wide of the goal.
Roma have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cengiz Under (Roma) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gianluca Rocchi signals a free kick to Roma.
Juventus drives forward and Marco Olivieri gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Turin.
Throw-in for Roma at Allianz Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Roma needs to be cautious. Juventus have an attacking throw-in.
Gianluca Rocchi awards the away team a throw-in.
Roma will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Juventus.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Rocchi.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
Federico Fazio (Roma) has received a first yellow card.
